title: Looking into Databases: Getting Started with Dbase IV
brief_description: This program offers a good introduction to computerised databases. It uses the setting of a modern day library to illustrate the concepts and operations of a database system, showing the advantages over a manual approach. A simple book retrieval system is then constructed using the facilities of dBase 1V.
